law.catch_line: Action upon judgment, contract, or bond -- Fifteen-year limitation -- Action for child support arrearages -- Time to commence action tolled until obligations cease as to last child on order.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 142, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2014. -- Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 4, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 90, sec. 30, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 130, effective July 1, 1982. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 417, effective January 2, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2514.
